title: Tangerine chocolate ganache tart
ingredients: ['125g unsalted butter', '90g caster sugar', '1 egg, beaten', '250g plain flour', '1 small pinch salt', '200g dark cooking chocolate', '1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '3 tangerines (or satsumas, clementines, etc.)', '150ml double cream (for the ganache)', '150ml double cream (whipped, to serve)']
